006
007package renderer.models_T;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker;
012
013/**
014   Create a wireframe model of a circle in the xy-plane centered at the origin.
015*/
016public class Circle extends Model implements MeshMaker
017{
018   public final double r;
019   public final int n;
020
021   /**
022      Create a circle in the xy-plane with radius 1 and
023      with 12 line segments around the circumference.
024   */
025   public Circle( )
026   {
027      this(1, 12);
028   }
029
030
031   /**
032      Create a circle in the xy-plane with radius {@code r}
033      and with 12 line segments around the circumference.
034
035      @param r  radius of the circle
036   */
037   public Circle(final double r)
038   {
039      this(r, 12);
040   }
041
042
043   /**
044      Create a circle in the xy-plane with radius {@code r}
045      and with {@code n} line segments around the circumference.
046
047      @param r  radius of the circle
048      @param n  number of line segments in the circle's circumference
049      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 3
050   */
051   public Circle(final double r, final int n)
052   {
053      super(String.format("Circle(%.2f,%d)", r, n));
054
055      if (n < 3)
056         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than 2");
057
058      this.r = r;
059      this.n = n;
060
061      // Create the circle's geometry.
062      final double deltaTheta = (2.0 * Math.PI) / n;
063
064      // Create all the vertices.
065      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
066      {
067         final double c = Math.cos(i * deltaTheta),
068                      s = Math.sin(i * deltaTheta);
069         addVertex( new Vertex(r * c, r * s, 0) );
070      }
071
072      // Create the line segments around the circle.
073      final LineLoop lineLoop = new LineLoop();
074      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
075      {
076         lineLoop.addIndex(i);
077      }
078      addPrimitive(lineLoop);
079   }
080
081
082
083   // Implement the MeshMaker interface (three methods).
084   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
085
086   @Override public int getVertCount() {return n;}
087
088   @Override
089   public Circle remake(final int n, final int k)
090   {
091      final int newN;
092      if (n != this.n)
093         newN = n;
094      else
095         newN = k;;
096
097      return new Circle(this.r, newN);
098   }
099}//Circle
